docs.abstract: An Illinois legislator has proposed removing the tax deduction for parents of obese children.
docs.lead_paragraph: The nudging war against obesity continues.
docs.snippet: An Illinois legislator has proposed removing the tax deduction for parents of obese children.

headline.seo: Causes, Diagnosis and Treatment for Gout
headline.print_headline: ‘Disease of Kings’ Trickles Down to the Rest
headline.main: ‘Disease of Kings’ Trickles Down to the Rest

docs.lead_paragraph: The number of Americans with gout is rising steadily as the population ages, becomes heavier and is exposed to foods that can precipitate the disorder in susceptible people.
docs.snippet: The number of Americans with gout is rising steadily as the population ages, becomes heavier and is exposed to foods that can precipitate the disorder in susceptible people.

headline.main: Marketing Junk to Kids – Or Not

docs.abstract: Perhaps someday soon the marketing of junk food to children will be as big a taboo as doctors marketing cigarettes.
docs.lead_paragraph: Last Wednesday I wrote about the Federal Trade Commission’s lame attempt to hinder the marketing of junk “food” to kids, who – even more than us dumb adults – lack the sophistication to differentiate between programming and advertising. (See this Jill Richardson piece about the shady world of marketing junk food to children.)
docs.snippet: Perhaps someday soon the marketing of junk food to children will be as big a taboo as doctors marketing cigarettes.
